Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Mr Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes come into effect on April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Mr Eric Schmidt said. Mr Page praised Mr Eric Schmidt , too. Google will take its eye off the Google Apps enterprise movement with Page in charge, given his penchant for prioritizing search engines, YouTube, and the Chrome browser and OS over enterprise software and services. If Google lets Google Apps languish, even a little bit, it only benefits Microsoft, says Roger Kay .
